title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Online Nursing Management Retraining: Interaction-Based Scenario Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing care and understanding of clinical practice
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can make decisions in real clinical scenarios based on nursing management theories.
Learners engage in sharing experiences and problem-solving processes with peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners demonstrate improved nursing management competencies through case analysis and essay evaluations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
